description:
Drive through an endless(?) desert. Follow the stars to a glowing portal to the next level.

Controls: use WASD or the left joystick to move charachters around, hit the A button or Space Bar when near a car to get in/out of it.

Game produced for the Mystic Western Game Jam

Can use either an Xbox 360 Controller Or Keyboard

Note: There seems to be an issue with the Mac version, new version with a possible fix has been uploaded but I don't have a mac to test on, let me know if there are issues
